text: Nebesa, nesmotrya na ikh velichiye i prochnost', gotovy raskolot'sya ot strakha pered Allakhom i pod vliyaniyem Yego velichiya i mogushchestva, i angely voznosyat khvalu Allakhu dostoynym obrazom, stavya Yego prevyshe togo, chto ne podobayet Yemu, i prosyat u Allakha proshcheniya tem, kto na zemle. I On, Vsevyshniy, ukazyvayet, chto tol'ko Allakhu prinadlezhat polnoye proshcheniye i bezgranichnaya milost'
